scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The 1963-1988 series comprise records of Warren Bergen Terry's many businesses and financial engagements through the 1960s-1980s. The series includes financial reports, accountant and attorney correspondence, administrative memoranda, contracts, and forms arranged by name or subject in alphabetical order. Notably, the series includes the purchase records for Domino Stud Farm in Lexington, Coca-Cola Bottling Company, Jerrico Restaurants, hotels like the Hilton Inn, and other business operations.
